title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{2\pi}{1}=2\pi$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{\left(-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}{1}=\frac{-\pi}{4}$$

title: Find the Vertical Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the vertical shift is D. So vertical shift is $$-1$$.
